attributes.review: First off, I would for SURE expect a great app to come with our great president, but NO!! It kept making my iphone crash!! NOT OK. Second it was very hard to navigate, THERE IS WAYYY too much information on the page,  my brain and eyeballs were OVERWHELMED!! Please fix this because i would love to have this app on my phone but it is far too sketchy!!  -D
attributes.title: TERRIBLE, HORRENDOUS, DISGUSTING

attributes.review: I got the app with high hopes and it took forever to download and kept giving me problems. One day I started to notice that it kept deleting and reinstalling so I knew something was up turns out the app got all my information and now is ruining my life I hate it so much worst app in the world...
attributes.title: This app ruined my life

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to better understand Trumps campaign, unfortunately all I got were too many notifications and solicitation to donate. I’m still unclear about that the purpose of this app is. Do not download it, it’s a waste of time. If you do download it, however, DO NOT ALLOW NOTIFICATIONS! You’ll thank me later.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our fascist president and to keep in touch with my cousins (who I fornicated with a couple days ago) what else is there to do in Alabama? Anywho, now the app wakes me up in the dead of night to strap a mask on my face and kick me in the breasts! I HAVE NEVER BEEN SO DISRESPECTED BY AN APP. Do not download this app unless you want to die. Type amen and share if you agree 🙏
attributes.title: Patriot 🇺🇸

attributes.review: when i first went on the app i was searching for good things trump has said, or any plans he has for an equal society, but i didn’t find any. the app is extremely hard to navigate and even made my phone lag. would not recommend to ANYONE. this app should be banned, as should trump.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: The format and look of the over app is terrible and I could not tell you the amount of times it crashes. I downloaded it to try to see if I could go to a rally and it kept freezing on the login page. You’d think an app from the president would be good but aperantly not
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Not only did this app take WEEKS to download for me, but when I actually got onto the app, it store all my personal data and gave it to the Orange house where President racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic Cheeto lives!!! This is an outrage!! I demand we take this app off the AppStore so we can all live without the stinky orange man haunting our data ✨😌
attributes.title: This app is ✨terrible✨

attributes.review: This app is so terrible I hate it so much it makes me want to vomit the graphics are horrible and it has trumps🤏 everywhere never download this app it is a horrible app. It also has bad pictures of hentai on there😧 so do NOT download it it is really bad it should be taken off the App Store for sure
attributes.title: Absolutly horribly designed 😡

attributes.review: To start off I download this app to keep up to date on the government but as soon as I opened it it glitched out and went back to the home screen. After that I turned off my phone and turned it back on and there was a picture of a bright orange oompa loompa on my screen! 😡
attributes.title: I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS 0 stars 😒

attributes.review: I could get better information about the president’s plans on FOX news. The app keeps crashing, so I can’t get anything to open long enough to read it. Then my phone kept freezing if it was open so I would have to restart my phone. It’s not worth the download.
attributes.title: Not worth it
